Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VG WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY CUESTIONARIOH2VGCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VG ( CUESTIONARIOH2VGCODI, PROYCODI, TIPO, DATACATCODI, ANIO, TRIMESTRE, VALOR, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :CUESTIONARIOH2VGCODI, :PROYCODI, :TIPO, :DATACATCODI, :ANIO, :TRIMESTRE, :VALOR, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VG SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, TIPO = :TIPO, DATACATCODI = :DATACATCODI, ANIO = :ANIO, TRIMESTRE = :TRIMESTRE, VALOR = :VALOR, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE CUESTIONARIOH2VGCODI = :CUESTIONARIOH2VGCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VG ORDER BY CUESTIONARIOH2VGCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VG SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = 0
SELECT * FROM CAM_CUESTIONARIOH2VG WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY CUESTIONARIOH2VGCODI ASC
